schema.description: 智能接入网关实例所属地域ID。
智能接入网关设备序列号。

BGP路由器ID。

取值格式为IPv4地址格式。

智能接入网关设备所属自治系统编号。

取值范围：**1~4294967295**。

保持时间。

取值范围：**3~65535**。单位：秒。

>在智能接入网关设备和对端设备建立对等体关系时，两端设备要协商Hold Time并保持一致，如果在Hold Time内未收到对端发来的KeepAlive或Update消息，则认为BGP连接中断。

存活时间间隔。

取值范围：**0~65535**。单位：秒。

400.errorMessage: The specified SAG instance does not exist.
The specified SAG software edition instance does not support ACL.
The specified instance does not exist.
The network configuration is not synchronized.

403.errorMessage: The specified smart access gateway is not online.
The current edition of the smart access gateway does not support this feature.
The current edition of the active smart access gateway does not support this feature.
The current edition of the standby smart access gateway does not support this feature.

500.errorMessage: The specified Smart Access Gateway has expired.
The specified Smart Access Gateway has not been activated.
The request cannot be completed. The Smart Access Gateway is offline.

title: 修改设备动态路由协议BGP配置
summary: 修改智能接入网关设备动态路由协议BGP的配置。
